ygData.subject: New Bard Songs on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: two new test songs.  i wonder if the first is a full mana drain like dirge.  now that is a lot more useful than a crappy AE dmg once an hour. Name:  BARD
ygData.messageBody:
two new "test" songs. i wonder if the first is a full mana drain like
dirge. now that is a lot more useful than a crappy AE dmg once an hour.

Name: BARD TEST SONG.
Level: 60.
Mana: Not Required.
Song Type: Stringed, not required.
Vendor: Unknown.
Approx Spell Cost: Unknown.
Type: Buffing song for increasing the power of the party.
Actual Effects: Party: Divine Aura.
Description: This is a very powerful song. It grants your entire party
complete invulnerability for 18 seconds. During this time, your party cannot
attack, or cast. It is very useful in aiding a party that needs to escape.

Name: BARD TEST SONG II.
Level: 60.
Mana: Not Required.
Song Type: Brass, not required.
Vendor: Unknown.
Approx Spell Cost: Unknown.
Type: General Purpose song of varied benefits.
Actual Effects: Target: Decrease Attack Speed by 31%.
Target: DoT for 250 hp.
Description: This song will lower the attack speed of the target slightly
less than Selo's Consanant Chain. It will also do 250 damage to the target
over the duration. The real advantage of this song is that it has a duration
of 10 ticks (1 minute), allowing the bard to weave more than 3 songs. This
is the first bard song to have a duration of more than 3 ticks.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L49 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
